articles.title: LG’s Wallpaper OLED TV returns to CES, and it’s wafer thin - The Verge
articles.description: The W6 Wallpaper TV from LG will have a Zero Connect Box and use LG’s new Hyper Radiant Color Technology and Brightness Booster Ultra.
